resources.string:
Hanover College History is a mobile application focused on engaging Hanover College students, alumni, and supporters with the history of Hanover College and its campus. There are two main ways to interact with the application:

1. Roam Campus - This option is a map where the current location of the user is tracked. While on the Hanover College campus, the user can walk and view each marked building. By clicking on a blue marker, the user can view the name of the site. By clicking on the name, a new window pops up with the information and photograph (if available).

2. Browse List - This option allows the user to search through all of the sites and people included in Hanover College History. A user is able to search either sites or people by an alphabetical listing or category.
Search through the Hanover College History database for a specific site or person.
Search all sites on the Hanover College History app. Choose to browse by alphabetical listing or category.
Search all people on the Hanover College History app. Choose to browse by alphabetical listing or category.
The fun and interactive way to learn the history of Hanover College!
The fun and interactive way to learn the history of Hanover College!
